name: Toolex Machine
overview:
Toolex Machine Tools Pvt Ltd Commenced in the year 2009, we “Toolex” are engaged in manufacturing and supplying a broad array of Lathe tools, turning tools, v-tools, facing tools, knife tool, cranked knife tool, carbide tipped brazed tool, carbide cutting tool, carbide brazed tool, lathe machine cutting Tool, Machine Cutting Tool, Tungsten Carbide Tool, Cutting Tool Accessories, Solid Carbide Tool etc.

Infrastructure: We are backed by a state-of-the-art infrastructure which is well equipped with modernized machines, tools and technologies. For smooth functionality, these sophisticated machines are regularly lubricated an maintained. Our infrastructure is sprawling across a wide area of land in order to ensure hassle free execution of all the business activities.

Our Team: We are backed by a highly adroit team of professions which is the backbone of our organization. Our team is enriched with highly experienced professionals who are well versed with the conceptual knowledge of our domain. They are instrumental in implementing sophisticated technologies to bring forth our product line.

Product Portfolio: We are catering to the diversified expectations of our esteemed clients by availing them a broad range of products. Our entire product line is manufactured with ultra grade raw material. In order to make comply with the international quality standards, we implement cutting edge technologies for manufacturing our products.
